frmCode.TITLE: 感谢使用UltimateFishBot
frmCode.LIBELLE_TITLE: 放轻松。。。该软件仍然是免费的!
frmCode.LIBELLE_DESC: 您已经使用Ultimate Fishbot{0}次。 为了继续使用它，你需要访问Fishbot网站并输入下方的3-5位数字。如果浏览器窗口无法打开，请访问 www.fishbot.net/code.html - 或点击以下的链接。我保证，这一过程快速且无痛。

frmDirections.TITLE: 简明教程
frmDirections.LABEL_SETTING_WOW_DESC: * 靠近水池 * 把钓鱼技能放到技能栏#1的位置 * 在系统-声音选项卡中，把主音量调整到100%，声音调高，音乐调低，环境音调低 * 把游戏改为窗口模式，并尽可能缩小游戏的画面
frmDirections.LABEL_FIND_LOCATION_DESC: * 走到湖边/水边 * 尽可能放大人物角色的视角 * 找到一处环境音尽量小的地点 * 避免其他任何有可能改变光标的东西
frmDirections.LABEL_FISH_DESC: * 点击开始, 往后坐, 让Gorton's Fisherman处理一切！

frmMain.LABEL_NO_LONGER_SAFE: 该辅助已经不安全，请勿用于公开服务器!
frmMain.LABEL_COULD_NOT_CHECK_STATUS: 无法验证状态！使用者自担风险。。。

frmSettings.TITLE: 设置
frmSettings.LABEL_DELAY_AFTER_CAST_DESC: 钓鱼施法之后、开始搜寻鱼漂之前的等待时间（毫秒）。太短容易让你跳过浮漂，太长会浪费时间。
frmSettings.LABEL_FISH_WAIT_LIMIT_DESC: 放弃钓鱼之前等待的时间（毫秒）。太长会降低程序的效率，太短会漏鱼。
frmSettings.LABEL_DELAY_AFTER_LOOTING_DESC: The number of milliseconds to wait after looting a fish.
frmSettings.LABEL_SCANNING_STEPS_DESC: The greater the number of steps, the less likely you are to miss the cursor, but the slower your scan will be.
frmSettings.LABEL_SCANNING_DELAY_DESC: The number of milliseconds to wait before checking if the cursor has changed. Too short and you might not detect the bobber, but a bigger number goes slower.
frmSettings.LABEL_SCANNING_RETRIES_DESC: How many times to run the search pattern, when the bobber has not been found.
frmSettings.LABEL_CHECK_ICON_DESC: Specify if the bot must check the icon before fishing. Avoid clicking when icon isn't a bobber. May not work on some computer, disable if the bot doesn't find the bobber.
frmSettings.LABEL_ALTERNATIVE_ROUTE_DESC: An alternative route for bobber searching.
frmSettings.LABEL_SCAN_AREA: Scanning Area (if disabled the scanning area will be calculated automatically):
frmSettings.SCAN_MESSAGE: Now an overlay will appear where you can select the scanning area. When you are done just double click the area or press ENTER. Click OK to continue...
frmSettings.AREA_SMALL: The Scanning area is too small!
frmSettings.LABEL_SPLASH_THRESHOLD_DESC: Determines if a given sound is loud enough to be a fish or not. Too low and the bot will mistake non-fish for fish. Too high and the bot will ignore the real fish.
frmSettings.LABEL_AUDIO_DEVICE_DESC: Select the audio device that WoW is Using. If the bot cannot 'hear' the game, it will never catch any fish. If you are unsure, play some music and select each device until you find the right one.
frmSettings.CB_AVG_SND: Use averaging method (better in crowded areas (Ogrimmar, etc...), but less chance to catch a fish)
frmSettings.LABEL_CUSTOMIZE_DESC: Customize shortkeys to avoid rearranging your bars before/after fishing.
frmSettings.CB_AUTO_HEARTHSTONE: Hearth to inn after X minutes:
frmSettings.CB_SHIFT_LOOT: Shift-Loot? (If AutoLoot is Disabled, Enable this)
frmSettings.LABEL_PROCESS_NAME_DESC: The name of the process to activate (this rarely changes) but has been updated with new expansions in the past.
frmSettings.LABEL_LANGUAGE_DESC: Select the language that you want to use. Language XML Files must be found in Resources folder.
frmSettings.LABEL_LANGUAGE_CHANGE: The application will restart to apply the language change.
frmSettings.RESET_MESSAGE: Click OK to reset all settings and restart the application.

frmAbout.TITLE: About
frmAbout.DESCRIPTION:
If you are like me - you love playing World of Warcraft, but leveling your fishing and cooking skill isn't any fun - you'd rather be *enjoying* the game rather than wasting hours doing what amounts to a chore.
Luckily, for both of us, I'm a computer programmer. I've put together an application that will fish for you.
For more info and FAQ go to www.fishbot.net
Authors: Rob ultimatefishbot@gmail.com, Mograine, henrikhermansen, and others... Icons from www.iconarchive.com and Google Image Search
